Name: Solar System Journey VR
About the game: Solar System Journey VR is a competitive space simulator designed to keep you on the edge of your seat. Compete with your friends for a high score as you race through our solar system, hitting checkpoints and blowing up asteroids. Don't forget to collect some fuel along the way!
